Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest

Brighouse, West Yorkshire First annual contest.
Best Soprano was Mark Wears (Pennine Brass).
June 14, 2010, 1:47 p.m. June 30, 2014, 1:06 p.m.
